dmca.title: Azalea Web Design Company Asks Google to Delist Client
dmca.body:
AZALEA TECHNOLOGY, LLC
[private]
Tyler, TX 75713-[private]
(xxx)xxx-xxxx

May 2nd, 2004

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Sir or Madam:

Digitallydistinct.com, a wholly owned subsidiary of Azalea Technology, LLC hereby asserts that [private], in association with www.tigercreek.org and www.tigerlink.org is in direct violation of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act. Digitallydistinct.com has created and provided for use on the public  Internet original design and artwork in conjunction with the aforementioned websites. Remnants of said copyrights can still be found dispersed within the sites source code, but all reference to our company and its design copyright has been removed without our consent. Neither Azalea Technology nor any of its subsidiaries have released the copyright from the design portion of these websites. In addition, portions of the design elements have been altered without our approval. The tigercreek.org site was published and payment is currently 9 months overdue. Therefore, the site is being provided illegally to the public. Azalea Technology is requesting that all links to www.tigercreek.org and www.tigerlink.org be removed immediately.

Search Query: Tiger org, Tiger Conservation, Brian Werner, Tiger Creek, Terri Werner, Tigers

Infringing Web Pages:	www.tigerlink.org	www.tigercreek.org
www.tigercreek.org/staff.html   www.tigercreek.org/getinvolved.html

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[private] CNE, CCNA, MCP, A+
Azalea Technology
[private]
Tyler, TX 75713-[private]
(xxx)xxx-xxxx
[private]@[private].com
